Potion.Name: Body Shard
Potion.Description: A shard of stone said to have magical properites to restore a persons body.

Potion.Name: Body Stone
Potion.Description: A stone said to have magical properites to restore a persons body.

Potion.Name: Great Body Stone
Potion.Description: One of the Greate Stones. It is said this stone has magical properites to restore a persons body.

Potion.Name: Soul Shard
Potion.Description: A shard of stone said to have magical properites to restore a persons soul.

Potion.Name: Soul Stone
Potion.Description: A stone said to have magical properites to restore a persons soul.

Potions.Potion: Great Soul Stone One of the Great Stones. It is said this stone has magical properites to restore a persons soul. 50 Potion true n:5;25 vMagic 500 0

Potion.Name: Restore Shard
Potion.Description: A shard of stone said to have magical properites to restore a persons body and soul.

Potion.Name: Restore Stone
Potion.Description: A stone said to have magical properites to restore a persons body and soul.

Potion.Name: Great Restore Stone
Potion.Description: One of the Greate Stones. It is said this stone has magical properites to restore a persons body and soul.

Potion.Name: Cleansing Shard
Potion.Description: A shard of stone said to have magical properites to relieve a person from poison.

Potion.Description: A shard of stone said to have magical properites to relieve a person from blindness.

Potion.Description: A shard of stone said to have magical properites to relieve a person from confusion.

Potion.Description: A shard of stone said to have magical properites to relieve a person from fascination.

Potion.Name: Shard of Awaking
Potion.Description: A shard of stone said to have magical properites to relieve a person from sleep.

Potion.Name: Dispel Stone
Potion.Description: A stone said to have magical properites to relieve a person from all ailments.
